mapper.update: update my_cart set select_cnt = select_cnt+#{selectCnt} where member_no=#{memberNo} and product_no=#{productNo}
mapper.select: select product_no from my_cart where product_no=#{productNo} and member_no=#{memberNo}

SELECT C.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, C.PRODUCT_PRICE AS PRODUCT_PRICE, sum(A.SELECT_CNT) AS SEL_CNT, A.PRODUCT_NO AS PRODUCT_NO FROM MY_CART A JOIN PRODUCT C ON A.PRODUCT_NO = C.PRODUCT_NO WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} group by C.product_name, C.product_price, A.product_no
mapper.delete: delete from my_cart where product_no=#{productNo} and member_no=#{memberNo}
